scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n server,ui -c blue,magenta "pnpm run dev:server" "pnpm run dev:ui"
scripts.dev:sync: concurrently -k -n server,ui -c blue,magenta "pnpm run dev:server --sync" "pnpm run dev:ui"
scripts.build:ui: pnpm --filter sqlrooms-cli-app build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.resolve('..','..','apps','sqlrooms-cli-ui','dist');const dst=path.resolve('sqlrooms','web','static');fs.rmSync(dst,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(dst,{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(src,dst,{recursive:true});console.log('Copied UI bundle to',dst);"
scripts.prerelease: pnpm run build:ui && uv run pytest && uv run ruff check && uv run ruff format --check
scripts.release: pnpm run build:ui && uv build && uvx twine upload --skip-existing ./dist/sqlrooms*
